column4: i had attached my keyboard to my laptop and now when i remove it and even if i do xorg reconfigure stuff the kb of laptop changes back to normal but after few seconds it agains starts working like keyboard with a keypad half of the keys like 'K' key types digit number 2 ... what should i do
uhh, are you sure you're not holding the "Fn" key, or that it isn't stuck? The Operating System doesn't decide whether that button is a K or a 2, that's a hardware thing.
if i hold down function key then it works fine but as i release it ... keyboard of laptop works as keypad ...
then there's something screwy going on with your keyboard. _JuDgEn_, numlock doesn't do that
